posts.message:
Kindly help me ,
I got windows azure error "an error occurred while processing your request" when i tried to access a web site is hosted in Windows Azure with SQL database
Hint: When i access the database from my local visual studio it is working well , So the connection string is correct

I'm using the active admin gem to install an admin interface to a web app I am currently building. thing is, it keeps saying that the email can't be blank, password cant be blank on running rake db:migrate, despite having the [AdminUser.create!(email: "admin@example.com"...) if direction == up] line written in the migration file.
I tried every solution I could find online but nothing worked for me (even removing the generated code and updating/redownloading and regenerating everything).
any help on that? did any of you encounter this error?
I'm using rails 4.1.2

are google ads something that I should fear ??!!
I recently got to know Neo4j  graph database .. and suddenly I can see many ads about it in many websites that I visit !!!!
do you see these ads yourselves?!! or does it really  relate with my browsing experience ???

Guys, Do anyone of you aware of a tool that checks JavaScript thrown errors ?
I mean to crawl the website and to log any errors it may find.
Thanks.
